comment: Pre-review complete. Verified all requirements against SOP-001, SOP-002 Section 6, and SOP-004. FRONTMATTER: title field present ("Demand-Driven Bootstrap and Terminal Fix"); revision_summary present ("Initial draft") -- acceptable for v0.x per SOP-001 Section 5.1. CR CONTENT: All 12 required sections per SOP-002 Section 6 are present and complete: Purpose (Section 1), Scope with Context/Changes Summary/Files Affected (Section 2), Current State (Section 3), Proposed State (Section 4), Change Description (Section 5), Justification (Section 6), Impact Assessment (Section 7), Testing Summary (Section 8), Implementation Plan (Section 9), Execution with EI table (Section 10), Execution Summary (Section 11), References (Section 12). EXECUTABLE BLOCK: EI table has all five required columns per SOP-004 Section 4.2 (EI, Task Description, Execution Summary, Task Outcome, Performed By - Date). Seven execution items with clear task descriptions. Execution Comments table present. PLACEHOLDERS: No TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX found. Execution-phase placeholders ([SUMMARY], [Pass/Fail], etc.) are expected template values. FORMATTING: Consistent section numbering, table formatting, and markdown structure. No typos or errors found. TRACEABILITY: References SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-004. No documents affected. Recommend for approval.

Post-review complete. Verified all post-review requirements per SOP-002 Section 7.3 and SOP-004.

EXECUTION COMPLETE (SOP-002 7.3.1): All 7 EIs have Task Outcome of Pass. EI-1 through EI-6 signed by claude - 2026-02-09. EI-7 signed by Lead + claude - 2026-02-09.

BLOCKING VARs (SOP-002 7.3.2): No VARs exist. All EIs passed.

DOCUMENTATION (SOP-002 7.3.3): No controlled documents affected per Section 7.2. N/A.

EVIDENCE (SOP-002 7.3.4): Each EI has narrative execution summary with technical detail. EI-1: import and function call placement described. EI-2: deviation documented (shell plugin replaced with Rust command). EI-3: all created/modified files listed with implementation details. EI-4: muteInput Set pattern and regex defense-in-depth described. EI-5/EI-6: specific README changes listed. EI-7: all 6 UAT scenarios with results (clean bootstrap, detached survival, no DA text, MCP auto-start, full stack, graceful degradation).

SDLC (SOP-002 7.3.5): CR does not affect SDLC-governed systems. N/A.

SCOPE INTEGRITY (SOP-004 Section 6): All 5 pre-approved scope items addressed. Two deviations discovered during UAT: (1) project root auto-detection added to config.py, (2) Tauri shell plugin replaced with Rust spawn_hub command for detached process spawning. Both deviations are thoroughly documented in execution comments with root cause and resolution. No scope items dropped -- deviations changed implementation mechanism while achieving approved objectives.

EXECUTION SUMMARY (Section 11): Complete narrative covering all EIs, both deviations, and final file list (12 files vs 10 planned).

FRONTMATTER: title "Demand-Driven Bootstrap and Terminal Fix" present. revision_summary "Initial draft" present (self-authorizing executable document per SOP-002 Section 8).

PLACEHOLDERS: No TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX found. All execution template placeholders replaced with actual data.

FORMATTING: Consistent section numbering (1-12), table formatting, markdown structure. No typos or errors found.

Recommend for post-approval.
